On March 11 , 2014 , three representatives from Concerned Women for America Legislative Action Committee ( CWALAC ) met with Ryan Zinke and his advisor Randy Vogel at Zinke 's office in Billings .
The meeting was at Zinke 's request ; he expressed a desire to know more about CWALAC .
In that meeting , we shared who our organization is and what we do .
